name: ExpansionTile
desc: A single-line [ListTile] with an expansion arrow icon that expands or collapses the tile to reveal or hide the [children].

fields.name: leading
fields.desc: A widget to display before the title.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The primary content of the list item.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.desc: Additional content displayed below the title.

fields.name: onExpansionChanged
fields.desc: Called when the tile expands or collapses.

fields.name: children
fields.desc: The widgets that are displayed when the tile expands.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The color to display behind the sublist when expanded.

fields.name: collapsedBackgroundColor
fields.desc: When not null, defines the background color of tile when the sublist is collapsed.

fields.name: trailing
fields.desc: A widget to display after the title.

fields.name: showTrailingIcon
fields.desc: Specifies if the [ExpansionTile] should build a default trailing icon if [trailing] is null.

fields.name: initiallyExpanded
fields.desc: Specifies if the list tile is initially expanded (true) or collapsed (false).

fields.name: maintainState
fields.desc: Specifies whether the state of the children is maintained when the tile expands and collapses.

fields.name: tilePadding
fields.desc: Specifies padding for the [ListTile].

fields.name: expandedAlignment
fields.desc: Specifies the alignment of [children], which are arranged in a column when the tile is expanded.

fields.name: expandedCrossAxisAlignment
fields.desc: Specifies the alignment of each child within [children] when the tile is expanded.

fields.name: childrenPadding
fields.desc: Specifies padding for [children].

fields.name: iconColor
fields.desc: The icon color of tile's expansion arrow icon when the sublist is expanded.

fields.name: collapsedIconColor
fields.desc: The icon color of tile's expansion arrow icon when the sublist is collapsed.

fields.name: textColor
fields.desc: The color of the tile's titles when the sublist is expanded.

fields.name: collapsedTextColor
fields.desc: The color of the tile's titles when the sublist is collapsed.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The tile's border shape when the sublist is expanded.

fields.name: collapsedShape
fields.desc: The tile's border shape when the sublist is collapsed.

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior}

fields.name: controlAffinity
fields.desc: Typically used to force the expansion arrow icon to the tile's leading or trailing edge.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: If provided, the controller can be used to expand and collapse tiles.

fields.name: dense
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.ListTile.dense}

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: Defines how compact the expansion tile's layout will be.

fields.name: minTileHeight
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.ListTile.minTileHeight}

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.ListTile.enableFeedback}

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Whether this expansion tile is interactive.

fields.name: expansionAnimationStyle
fields.desc: Used to override the expansion animation curve and duration.

fields.name: internalAddSemanticForOnTap
fields.desc: Whether to add button:true to the semantics if onTap is provided. This is a temporary flag to help changing the behavior of ListTile onTap semantics.
